review: I have been using Chromecast for over a month now & extremely satisfied with it.  It's ease of use & Price are the best features of this little devil. I would recommend this to anyone who would like to stream audio/video content on to your HDTV via Wi-Fi. I have heard that Hulu Plus, Pandora Radio , HBO Go, Redbox Instant are soon going to be added. Overall, amazing product by Google. Buy it & I'm sure you will not be disappointed. Cheers :-).
